content: The after-tax net present value of our proved plus probable reserves discounted at 10%, increased 36% from the prior year to $8.9 billion or $54 per share, with PDP reserves making up more than 50% of this value, including acquisitions, we replaced 234% of production on a proved plus probable basis, at an FD&A cost, including future development costs of $19.22 per BOE, resulting in a total proved plus probable FD&A operating recycle ratio of 4.4 times.
